name: MKCoordinateRegion
desc: A rectangular geographic region centered around a specific latitude and longitude.

items.name: init(center: CLLocationCoordinate2D, latitudinalMeters: CLLocationDistance, longitudinalMeters: CLLocationDistance)
items.desc: Creates a new coordinate region from the specified coordinate and distance values.

items.name: init(MKMapRect)
items.desc: Returns the region that corresponds to the specified map rectangle.

items.name: init(center: CLLocationCoordinate2D, span: MKCoordinateSpan)
items.desc: Creates a coordinate region with a span around the specified center coordinate.

items.name: var center: CLLocationCoordinate2D
items.desc: The center point of the region.

items.name: var span: MKCoordinateSpan
items.desc: The horizontal and vertical span representing the amount of map to display.
